short_summary: This requirement is for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC).This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for category 2.15 Facilitation Services
description: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the services of two (2) Facilitator consultants, as and when requested, to conduct facilitated engagement activities to support the delivery of the Net-Zero Advisory Board (NZAB)\
